title: Bernie Sanders' team creates way for people to reach the White House
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Bernie Sanders' team creates way for people to reach the White House For those looking to air their grievances regarding the way President Donald Trump is handling things, Bernie Sanders may have the solution. Nathan Rousseau Smith (@fantasticmrnate) explains.
